resources.string: 这款仪表盘可以被任何人使用并删除这段文字\n开源地址：https://github.com/hujincan/AndIconpack
Google Now Launcher is NOT Compatible

Google Now Launcher is NOT compatible with ANY Icon Packs. Please do not rate the icon pack negatively for this reason. There is a solution that you can try for yourself, but it requires the use of an external app. Would you like to download it?
We are sorry, but LG Home app is exclusive of LG devices, and therefore it can not be downloaded from Google Play Store.
Direct apply could not be completed for this launcher. Please apply the icon pack manually, in launcher settings.
%1$s is currently not installed on your device.\nWould you like to install it from the Google Play Store?
%1$s is part of CyanogenMod (based) roms.\nWould you like to install it on your device?
